arts.ttl: Alonso reflects on Wolfsburg draw: "We're on a good path"
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen manager Xabi Alonso shared his thoughts on his team’s performance following their hard-fought draw against Wolfsburg. Despite failing to secure the victory, Alonso expressed satisfaction with his squad’s effort and remained optimistic about their progress.

arts.ttl: Leverkusen loses ground in Bundesliga title race, Dortmund loses again in Kovač’s debut
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen has been dealt a major blow to its Bundesliga title defense, and Borussia Dortmund’s malaise has continued through Niko Kovač’s debut as coach. Also Saturday, Dortmund lost 2-1 at home to Stuttgart in Kovač’s first game in charge.

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen draw blank against well-drilled Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Leverkusen goalkeeper Lukáš Hrádecký makes a crucial save to keep his team in the game - ODD ANDERSEN The Spanish tactician made eight changes to his starting line-up following the Werkself's extra-time midweek DFB Cup victory against Cologne, with key players like Florian Wirtz and Patrik Schick starting on the bench.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Huge wins for Stuttgart, Freiburg and Union Berlin, goalless draws in Wolfsburg and Mainz
arts.sum: On a dramatic afternoon across the Bundesliga, VfB Stuttgart, Union Berlin and SC Freiburg secured huge wins to get their league form back on track, whilst goalless draws containing Mainz, Augsburg, Wolfsburg and Bayer Leverkusen questioned the respective European and title credentials of Mainz and Bayer Leverkusen.

arts.ttl: Jonas Wind on Wolfsburg's European push, the club's Danish contingent, Super Bowl LIX and more
arts.sum: I expect a tough game, but last time we played them here at home we had a good fight and lost by one goal . bundesliga.com: Like you say: on the other hand, a good season with eight goals and three assists so far?

arts.ttl: Saturday's Bundesliga predictions including Wolfsburg vs. Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Bundesliga fixtures, including Wolfsburg vs. Bayer Leverkusen.

arts.ttl: Amid another uninspired attacking effort, Bayern Munich execs “dream” of Bayer Leverkusen’s Florian Wirtz
arts.sum: That’s why Uli is certainly right,” Bayern Munich CEO Jan-Christian Dreesen said (as captured by Sky Sport journalist Kerry Hau via @iMiaSanMia ). Following Bayern Munich’s 3-0 victory over Werder Bremen, where the attacking group lacked bite, Wirtz became a hot topic once again.

arts.ttl: Predicted Wolfsburg v Bayer Leverkusen XIs: Victor Boniface to return
arts.sum: After his brace against FC Köln to eliminate local rivals FC Köln from the DFB Pokal in midweek, Victor Boniface is set to start ahead of Patrik Schick in the…

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg vs Bayer Leverkusen preview: Champions aim to remain in title pursuit
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen will look to keep their Bundesliga title hopes alive when they visit Volkswagen Arena on Saturday to face Wolfsburg.

arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso gives update on Grimaldo's head injury
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen boss Xabi Alonso has played down fears that Alejandro Grimaldo suffered a serious injury in the midweek win over FC Köln.
